METHOD: _correctSingles
	MULTI-LINE-COMMENT: {4218,4454}
		/* 	 * _correctSingles() and _containsAnySingle() methods controlls if a single-line 	 * comment is in another type comment's bounds-rannge-. if it is, the dedected 	 * single comment will be removed from _localComment(LinkedList). 	 */

--------------------------------------------------
